skills.description: <ONCE PER TURN> When your Battle Card attacks a Leader Card, if the attacking card has 15000 or more power, draw 1 card.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

This card can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode.
